alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Logan and west central Yell Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue Mountain, or 14 miles south of Paris, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Macedonia in Yell County... Waveland... Spring Lake Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
